publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5787 Jamie Stone: Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall—That the Parliament notes the high quality work being carried out at the Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall; recognises that this unique service is vital to many people right across the Highlands; is deeply concerned, however, that a review of the service by NHS Highland would potentially reduce the service drastically and believes that this would seriously impact on locally accessible patient treatment and care, and, accordingly, urges the Scottish Government to liaise with NHS Highland to ensure that this service is maintained at its current level.
S3M-5787 Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall (lodged on 19 February 2010) Mary Scanlon*
S3M-5787 Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall (lodged on 19 February 2010) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-5787 Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall (lodged on 19 February 2010) Dave Thompson*, Jackie Baillie*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mike Pringle*, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-5787 Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall (lodged on 19 February 2010) Hugh O’Donnell*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jim Hume*
S3M-5787 Highland Rheumatology Unit in Dingwall (lodged on 19 February 2010) Ross Finnie*
